formalText: They had an impromptu session on Friday night.
They are currently recovering from a shoulder surgery and it has been a painful recovering, then they found out they have a herniated disc in their cervical spine.
Friday night they were out with their friend and got overwhelmed by their friends over explaining about the patients situation.
This lead them to a state of hysteria because they felt very desperate.
They have been better about taking positive feedback and taking responsibility of their emotion instead of circumstances.
They are trying to rush the process of getting better because they believe it should only take weeks to fix life long issues.
They have fear over the uncontrollable and would be unable to communicate what was happening.
They are going to work on activating events connected to their girlfriend and their expectations of their self
They listen and believe what people say even if the people are not an expert in the field in question.
When they feel desperate, they think they become more gullible.
They are very frustrated at this point because the pain is just debilitating.
They have always been someone who's very hard on themself.
They felt very depressed, in their new relationship.
She is telling herself to make herself depressed when she said just now she is a fallible human she jumped already to the effective New Philosophy.
They  have courageously demonstrated that even when they are suffering in those ways they are able to make some helpful effort and change.
They are frustrated with themself.
They are lost.
They have a talent for awfulizing.
They fear of being severely depressed and living on the street.
They said they felt depressed but it was more anxiety. It was about investigating thoughts are creating it.
They feel like they should not be feeling this way and just unfair that they have been feeling this way as for as long as they have.
They are in a better mood, but they are exhausted.
They are putting insane pressure on themselves.
They feel like they should be perfect.
They need to learn they have the freedom and choice to imperfectly step-by-step regarding creating a healthier inner emotional life.
They went to a Halloween party and there was seeing a lot of friends that they hadn't seen in a while and they sort of had to put on a happy face.
They didn't have a neck brace on and they felt like they needed to make it seem like they were ok to their friends.
She has been practicing the attitude that her mother modeled for her or she can stop is because she now knows how unhealthy her mother's behavior was.
